class.name: RenderData
class.brief_description: Abstract render data object, holds frame data related to rendering a single frame of a viewport.
class.description: Abstract render data object, exists for the duration of rendering a single viewport. [b]Note:[/b] This is an internal rendering server object, do not instantiate this from script.

method.name: get_camera_attributes
method.description: Returns the [RID] of the camera attributes object in the [RenderingServer] being used to render this viewport.

method.name: get_environment
method.description: Returns the [RID] of the environments object in the [RenderingServer] being used to render this viewport.

method.name: get_render_scene_buffers
method.description: Returns the [RenderSceneBuffers] object managing the scene buffers for rendering this viewport.

method.name: get_render_scene_data
method.description: Returns the [RenderSceneData] object managing this frames scene data.
